resources.string: Quotes&Memes
“There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.” \n– Edith Wharton
“You do not find the happy life. You make it.” \n– Camilla Eyring Kimball
“The most wasted of days is one without laughter.” \n– E.E. Cummings
“Stay close to anything that makes you glad you are alive.” \n– Hafez
“Make each day your masterpiece.” \n– John Wooden
“Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn’t know you left open.” \n– John Barrymore
“Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.” \n– Jim Rohn
“Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.” \n– Lindsey Vonn
“Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.” \n– Helen Keller
“Impossible is for the unwilling.” \n– John Keats
“No pressure, no diamonds.” \n– Thomas Carlyle
“Believe you can and you’re halfway there.” \n– Theodore Roosevelt
“Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.” \n– Truman Capote
“It is never too late to be what you might have been.” \n– George Eliot
“When you have a dream, you’ve got to grab it and never let go.” \n– Carol Burnett
“You must be the change you wish to see in the world.” \n– Mahatma Gandhi
“Stay foolish to stay sane.” \n– Maxime Lagacé
“Stay hungry. Stay foolish.” \n– Steve Jobs
“Whatever you are, be a good one.” \n– Abraham Lincoln
“You must do the things you think you cannot do.” \n– Eleanor Roosevelt
“Wherever you go, go with all your heart.” \n– Confucius
“Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.” \n– André Gide
“Dream big and dare to fail.” \n– Norman Vaughan
“My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive.” \n– Maya Angelou
“You are enough just as you are.” \n– Meghan Markle
“To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.” \n– Wilson Kanadi
“No matter what you’re going through, there’s a light at the end of the tunnel.” \n– Demi Lovato
“Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.” \n– Albert Einstein
“Every moment is a fresh beginning.” \n– T.S. Eliot
“No guts, no story.” \n– Chris Brady
